name: Pull Me Under
desc:
Lost in the <input type="text" value="" data-result="sky" />
Clouds roll by and I <input type="text" value="" data-result="roll" /> with them
Arrows <input type="text" value="" data-result="fly" />
Seas increase and then <input type="text" value="" data-result="fall" /> again

This world is spinning <input type="text" value="" data-result="around" /> me
This world is spinning <input type="text" value="" data-result="without" /> me
Every day sends <input type="text" value="" data-result="future" /> to past
Every breath leaves one less to my <input type="text" value="" data-result="last" />

Watch the sparrow <input type="text" value="" data-result="falling" />
Gives new <input type="text" value="" data-result="meaning" /> to it all
If not today nor yet <input type="text" value="" data-result="tomorrow" /> then some other day

I'll take <input type="text" value="" data-result="seven" /> lives for one
And then my only father's <input type="text" value="" data-result="son" />
As sure as I ever did <input type="text" value="" data-result="love" /> him
I am not <input type="text" value="" data-result="afraid" />

This world is spinning <input type="text" value="" data-result="around" /> me
The whole world <input type="text" value="" data-result="keeps" /> spinning around me
All life is future to <input type="text" value="" data-result="past" />
Every breath leaves me one <input type="text" value="" data-result="less" /> to my last

Pull me under Pull me under
Pull me under I'm not <input type="text" value="" data-result="afraid" />
All that I feel is <input type="text" value="" data-result="honor" /> and spite
All I can do is to set it <input type="text" value="" data-result="right" />

<input type="text" value="" data-result="Dust" /> fills my eyes
Clouds roll <input type="text" value="" data-result="by" /> and I roll with them
Centuries <input type="text" value="" data-result="cry" />
Orders <input type="text" value="" data-result="fly" /> and I fall again

This world is spinning <input type="text" value="" data-result="inside" /> me
The whole world is <input type="text" value="" data-result="spinning" /> inside of me
Every day <input type="text" value="" data-result="sends" /> future to past
Every <input type="text" value="" data-result="step" /> brings me closer to my last

Pull me under Pull me under
Pull me under I'm not <input type="text" value="" data-result="afraid" />
Living my life too much in the <input type="text" value="" data-result="sun" />
Only until your <input type="text" value="" data-result="will" /> is done

Pull me under Pull me under
Pull me under I'm not <input type="text" value="" data-result="afraid" />
All that I feel is honor and <input type="text" value="" data-result="spite" />
All I can do is to set it <input type="text" value="" data-result="right" />

Pull me under Pull me under
Pull me under I'm not <input type="text" value="" data-result="afraid" />
Living my <input type="text" value="" data-result="life" /> too much in the sun
Only until your will is <input type="text" value="" data-result="done" />
